reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy It NEOOWWW!!!
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for a product that does exactly what it says…baby this it it! The soap smells sooo good right out the box! I wasn’t so sure about the smell of the oil but after I washed and rubbed the oil on, my kitty was so smooth and soft. Went to bed and the next morning I am still feeling that softness and the smell of the strawberries is still very fresh. Will definitely be buying more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so in love with this yoni oil and the soap is awesome too! Smells amazing for hours, helps get rid of my ingrown hairs and razor bumps, also has started to soothe out the texture on my skin. Not sticky whatsoever. I need more already!!! I just wish there were other smells than just strawberry 😩

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s a nice product
reviews.reviewText: This product is regular soap: no healing properties. The scent of artificial strawberries is nice and last. I did experience slight irritation so I would not recommend for sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is the real deal.
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin and I've used many products including Summers Eve, the Yoni products keep me feeling fresh all day, which is definitely a confidence booster. I am excited and grateful to know this product is available...I tell everyone about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this Product🥰
reviews.reviewText: Always smells so great and I feel fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: While this product smells amazing, I'm not sure if it actually works. I ended up using the oil as a skin moisturizer. The soap suds up really good and makes me feel squeaky clean, but again, I'm not sure if it would eliminate any vaginal oder. It didn't irritate my skin at all. I love the smell of it. I'd recommend this product to use, but not to eliminate vaginal oder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these products, works great!
reviews.reviewText: This has become my favorite soap to use in the shower! It lathers amazingly, smells fabulous, and really does help reduce odor, especially when combined with the oil. The oil on its own also works great! Going through peri menopause is like going through puberty all over again, including unbecoming odors! I won’t go without these products moving forward!
